meanings.sent1: The oversized hat looked unfitting on her small head.
meanings.sent2: Wearing a swimsuit to a formal event would be considered unfitting.
meanings.sent3: The penguin wearing a tuxedo to a beach party looked quite unfitting.
meanings.sent4: Her loud laughter in the solemn library was as unfitting as a clown at a funeral.
meanings.sent5: The bright pink paint on the historic building was so unfitting that it became a local joke.

meanings.definition: Not in accordance with the established standards or norms
meanings.sent1: His behavior at the fancy restaurant was unfitting for such a classy place.
meanings.sent2: The torn jeans were deemed unfitting attire for the formal dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowing during a dog show seemed quite unfitting.
meanings.sent4: Her rebellious spirit was as unfitting as a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti on the pristine wall was so unfitting that it shocked the entire neighborhood.
